c4316920-2a98-49b5-b7b6-787c3a964066.description: This course is a survey of basic contract law across a variety of areas. It covers the nature of contracts and the basic building blocks of contracts: offer, acceptance and consideration, including discussions of the mailbox rule, mutuality of consideration and promissory estoppel. It also focuses on Uniform Commercial Code and its rules for contracts for the sale of goods. Finally, the course looks at contract defenses and remedies.
c4316920-2a98-49b5-b7b6-787c3a964066.name: Basics of Contract Law

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Basics of Contract Law course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

268e48fc-6be3-42e2-b03c-cfdd6e83e675.description: This course surveys crimes and their punishments under the state and federal justice systems in the United States. It looks at the reasons for punishing crimes, defines many crimes and discusses how sentences are determined. It also looks at liability for inchoate crimes and accomplice liability. Finally, the course covers defenses to criminal charges and when they are applicable.
268e48fc-6be3-42e2-b03c-cfdd6e83e675.name: Basics of Criminal Law

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Basics of Criminal Law course

56651328-9b1d-4b61-8d7a-c153059caec3.description: This course focuses on legal issues relating to online communications, agreements and transactions. It covers issues including jurisdiction over e-commerce companies, enforceability of online agreements and dispute resolution techniques. I also covers legal issues that frequently come up in Internet law contexts, such as intellectual property, defamation and invasion of privacy. The course also looks at online crimes and state laws to stop Strategic Lawsuits Against Public Participation.
56651328-9b1d-4b61-8d7a-c153059caec3.name: Cyber Law

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Cyber Law course

The course includes information in application of copyright principles and to distinguish between ideas, which are not copyrightable, and tangible expressions, which are. In addition, the course covers copyright protection for digital content and in the process for securing, holding and renewing copyright terms where applicable.
50c2c67a-5db5-4248-8a68-aaaf88bed1be.name: Acquiring Copyright Protection

890f52db-cd14-4447-92e6-215af0d943d8.description: This course focuses on the legal mechanisms to protect distinctive logos, slogans and other visual marks associated with products from unauthorized use by other parties. f757af9b-9b3e-4426-b419-c846da647309.description: This tort law course focuses on the most common causes of action, including intentional torts and negligence. The course looks at assault, battery, false imprisonment, trespass and more "modern" torts, such as intentional infliction of emotional distress and malicious prosecution. The course also covers defenses to tort claims. The negligence section of the course focuses on duty, breach, causation and damages and on various special rules relevant to negligence causes of action.

ae104407-e2c1-4357-86e6-f8b70df6acd1.description: This course details many of the freedoms we enjoy under the First Amendment to the Constitution, including freedoms of speech, the press, assembly and petition. It covers the types of expressions that are and are not protected and the extent to and standards under which which government may limit expression.
ae104407-e2c1-4357-86e6-f8b70df6acd1.name: Freedom of Speech

cebf5990-28b5-4873-b73f-449d3c637928.description: This course teaches product liability law. Product liability is a division of torts and personal injury law that is often the subject of class action lawsuits and routinely generates large monetary verdicts. The course covers liability for manufacturing defect, design defect, failure to warn and breach of warranty.

It looks at contract law issues unique to Internet-based commerce, privacy legislation, the application of consumer protection laws to e-commerce, laws regulating unsolicited emails and spyware, sales tax of e-commerce transactions, the Financial Services Modernization Act and the regulation of Internet gambling and crypto-currencies.

It also focuses on relevance, character evidence and the many exceptions to the prohibition on character evidence. It next turns to authentication, privilege and witness testimony. The course winds up with a discussion of the hearsay rule.

ff0e2115-0631-4404-8c07-ca73447a9608.description: This course comprehensively discusses the two major types of support payments that can be ordered after separation, divorce or out-of-wedlock births: alimony and child support. The course looks at the history of alimony and child support and the evolution of both concepts over time. It looks at how the amounts are determined, how they are agreed upon or dictated and how they are enforced. We also look at state and federal laws that have put "teeth" in spousal and child support orders.
ff0e2115-0631-4404-8c07-ca73447a9608.name: Alimony and Child Support

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Alimony and Child Support course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

1a389890-71ac-4193-bb5f-c0a1decf4dc5.description: This course covers the device that allows people to transfer assets after death, an exception to the general rule that gifts can only be given by living people. It covers various types of wills and their roles, the requirements for a valid will and grounds for invalidating a will, such as fraud and undue influence. The course looks at various will provisions and when they fail for one reason or another. The course also discusses the roles of the fiduciaries and testamentary trusts.
1a389890-71ac-4193-bb5f-c0a1decf4dc5.name: Wills

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Wills course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

6d4584ef-1500-4be0-8eb7-5a29aa2940ad.description: This course surveys the multitudes of steps that have been taken to protect consumers from predatory practices of lenders, sellers and other participants in the marketplace. It works through landmark pieces of legislation such as the Truth in Lending Act, Equal Credit Opportunity Act and Fair Credit Reporting Act. It also focuses on mandatory disclosures for credit issuers and other, less famous consumer protection laws such as the Credit CARD and Real Estate Settlement Procedures Acts.
6d4584ef-1500-4be0-8eb7-5a29aa2940ad.name: Consumer Protection

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Consumer Protection course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

3e951d35-7453-432b-a4c8-8298d90c4932.description: This course provides the badge holder with a comprehensive overview of the process of discovery in civil litigation. The course focuses on depositions, interrogatories, requests for production and other devices. It also looks at the scope of discovery and exceptions for privilege and work product. The course also covers admissibility of the products of discovery and course supervision, including the possibility of sanctions.
3e951d35-7453-432b-a4c8-8298d90c4932.name: Discovery in Civil Litigation

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Discovery in Civil Litigation course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

d968bf34-46f7-4740-97c3-9d3c8aea65a6.description: This course provides the badge holder with an understanding of the complex regulatory framework under which the primary driver of the healthcare industry operates. It defines the various types of health insurance, explains risks and coverage, looks at the effects of the Affordable Care Act (especially with respect to pre-existing conditions), privacy requirements under HIPAA, continuing insurance after leaving a job under COBRA and and the claims and appeals processes.
d968bf34-46f7-4740-97c3-9d3c8aea65a6.name: Health Insurance Law

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Health Insurance Law course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

b0f97d16-4c43-4b57-b455-43eb6652a5f3.description: This course focuses on the laws under the Uniform Commercial Code’s Articles 3, 4 and 5 that affect commercial paper, negotiable instruments and other payment systems.
b0f97d16-4c43-4b57-b455-43eb6652a5f3.name: Commercial Payments

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Commercial Payments course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

098fa8af-d7ab-46d1-955c-aef088a465f2.description: This course focuses on mortgages, mortgage execution and mortgage documentation in residential settings. The course looks at the process of applying for, gaining approval for and closing on a transaction where a mortgage provides the collateral interest. The course discusses the various mortgage documents and their roles and the comprehensive set of federal regulations designed to protect mortgagors. It also looks at the reasons for the mortgage crisis and how a repeat can be avoided.
098fa8af-d7ab-46d1-955c-aef088a465f2.name: Residential Mortgages

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Residential Mortgages course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

5049f040-5ec2-46ac-8fd2-61746b86e0bf.description: This course provides the badge holder with an understanding of the social security system in the United States. The course includes information on eligibility, calculations of benefits and the mechanics by which the program is run. The course also looks at social security disability and SSI. Finally, the course focuses on the process of obtaining social security and appealing adverse decisions.
5049f040-5ec2-46ac-8fd2-61746b86e0bf.name: Social Security

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Social Security course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

ec07caad-da93-495b-8035-1a0a78b15061.description: This course focuses on the relationships between debtors and creditors and the many state and federal laws that seek to protect the interests of both sides. It also covers liens, fraudulent conveyance rules and collection actions.
ec07caad-da93-495b-8035-1a0a78b15061.name: Debtor-Creditor Law

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Debtor-Creditor Law course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

skills.name: Fair Debt Collection Practices Act Enforcement

bd78dd42-5b21-4e3d-8b3b-92792efc0c76.description: This course looks at zoning and zoning regulation alternatives as they have been applied throughout the United States. It focuses specifically on urban planning, which is a subset of land-use law. Also covered extensively are zoning laws and systems and the mechanisms by which these are established and enforced.
bd78dd42-5b21-4e3d-8b3b-92792efc0c76.name: Land Use and Zoning

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Land Use and Zoning course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

86583e5a-04ee-4efe-a1bc-ce1d4708f4e1.description: This course covers the laws and procedures of medical malpractice actions, one of the most lucrative and controversial areas of personal injury law practice. It covers causes of action, the duties owed by medical professionals to their patients, proving causation and the defenses of contributory negligence and assumption of risk. We also look at the role of the malpractice insurer in the process and common methods of alternative dispute resolution in malpractice cases.
86583e5a-04ee-4efe-a1bc-ce1d4708f4e1.name: Medical Malpractice

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Medical Malpractice course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

0672ece5-4552-416c-870b-f732cfda2aed.description: This course looks at the rules that govern many kinds of insurance and introduces the student to the purposes that insurance fulfills and the regulatory landscape against which it is governed.
0672ece5-4552-416c-870b-f732cfda2aed.name: Insurance Law

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Insurance Law course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

da78a84c-8dca-469f-b1ce-84a6bfbbfe2c.description: This course looks at mergers between large companies and acquisitions. It focuses on the finance of mergers, antitrust issues and hostile takeovers. The course also discusses the mechanics of share exchanges and the roles of the SEC and DOJ.
da78a84c-8dca-469f-b1ce-84a6bfbbfe2c.name: Mergers & Acquisitions

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Mergers & Acquisition course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

71aeb58a-576c-4d13-bcf6-c40feeb78ac6.description: This course looks at the probate process, which is the mechanism by which estates are distributed to their beneficiaries under court supervision. It looks at the process from the steps immediately following death through the final accounting. Also covered are avoiding probate, probate jurisdiction, enforceability of various will clauses, will challenges, appointment of fiduciaries and guardians ad litem and more.
71aeb58a-576c-4d13-bcf6-c40feeb78ac6.name: Probate Process

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Probate Process course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

532f971e-5e27-44bf-abd9-1b3bcc255a9f.description: This course covers the skills necessary to to draft trusts and trust provisions that incorporate a variety of concerns and rules, including those that relate to creditor protection, benefits planning and taxation. It also assists with building the ability write trust provisions that accomplish client goals and solve problems that come up in the contexts of Medicaid, benefits eligibility, creditors, estate tax, gift tax, income tax, property tax and planning for family dynamics.
532f971e-5e27-44bf-abd9-1b3bcc255a9f.name: Trusts and Trust Provisions

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Trusts and Trust Provision course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

c1b5aa00-913d-4550-92db-a9183707fcac.description: This course focuses on administrative law and agencies in the United States. Because Congress is incapable of governing the minute details of the execution of every federal law, it must delegate some of its responsibilities. It does so by establishing administrative agencies which clarify, enforce and sometimes even adjudicate federal law. This course covers how federal agencies are created, their authorities and their processes under the Administrative Procedures Act.
c1b5aa00-913d-4550-92db-a9183707fcac.name: Administrative Law

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Administrative Law course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

d248e738-7e23-4f73-b5cc-c81990352f96.description: This course details the freedoms we enjoy under the First Amendment to the Constitution, including freedoms of speech, religion, the press, assembly and petition. If focuses mainly on free expression laws, exceptions to freedom of speech and the "establishment" and "free exercise" of religion clauses in the First Amendment.
d248e738-7e23-4f73-b5cc-c81990352f96.name: First Amendment Law

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the First Amendment Law course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

ad0979db-de78-493f-935a-7b3f7cc271bc.description: This course focuses on the first two clauses of the First Amendment to the US Constitution: the clauses prohibiting the government from “establishing” a national religion and the clause preventing the government from “prohibiting the free exercise thereof.” The course looks at the ways in which these have been interpreted and at many cases defining these constitutional provisions.
ad0979db-de78-493f-935a-7b3f7cc271bc.name: Freedom of Religion

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Freedom of Religion course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

fe94666d-7641-43f3-b5c3-098d28365cbd.description: This course covers legal and ethical considerations in drug development. It looks at the landscape of how the drug development process is regulated and at some of those most important regulations. Topics focused on include the 21st Century Cures Act, promotion and marketing of drugs, the “Bad ad” program, and at government steps to relax regulations for drugs that are urgently needed.
fe94666d-7641-43f3-b5c3-098d28365cbd.name: Legal Considerations in Drug Development

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Legal Considerations in Drug Development course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

f6ad3272-1a00-429d-9ee5-16a7a1bc5223.description: This course looks at the primary insurer for Americans over age 65: Medicare. The course runs through the history of Medicare and comprehensively reviews the four "parts" of the program. The course discusses important details of eligibility, payments, responsibilities of the patient and appeals of denials. The course also looks at coverage under each of the 4 parts of Medicare in detail.
f6ad3272-1a00-429d-9ee5-16a7a1bc5223.name: Medicare

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Medicare course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

bea4e249-9bd5-48e0-bead-f6f46fe344db.description: This course covers many aspects of the workers' compensation system, which protects employees and employers in case of a workplace injury. Areas covered include elements of a workers' compensation claim, entitlement to benefits, scheduled and non-scheduled injuries and pre-existing conditions.
bea4e249-9bd5-48e0-bead-f6f46fe344db.name: Workers' Compensation

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Workers' Compensation course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

03d4884d-76db-4d6b-b26c-58c35f72e9e7.description: This course focuses on the ERISA rules governing retirement accounts, welfare plans and other employee benefits. It looks at the employer’s responsibilities under ERISA and the nuts and bolts of ensuring the compliance of qualified plans with federal regulation. It also looks at the responsibilities of the administrators and ERISA litigation.
03d4884d-76db-4d6b-b26c-58c35f72e9e7.name: ERISA and Pension Plans

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the ERISA and Pension Plans course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

56e39cce-0b95-433f-a438-bd75d68f7a4b.description: This course goes through the two major types of support payments that can be ordered after separation, divorce or out-of-wedlock births: alimony and child support. The second half of the course focuses on the basics of child custody and visitation rights awarded to non-custodial parents.
56e39cce-0b95-433f-a438-bd75d68f7a4b.name: Family Support and Child Custody Law

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the final examination.

87221741-aac7-4230-9272-9f32126f00d0.description: This course covers Social Security and Medicare, two massive government programs designed primarily to assist seniors and both funded by federal payroll taxes. Social Security provides financial assistance to older Americans who have retired, disabled workers, and even families who have experienced the death of a breadwinner. Most retired Americans are also eligible for Medicare, a government-subsidized health insurance program that is primarily for the benefit of people 65 and older.
87221741-aac7-4230-9272-9f32126f00d0.name: Social Security and Medicare Law

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the final exam

ffc83c52-8667-4944-8d20-67dbb2fc54b3.description: This course focuses on the ownership, exploration and accessing of subterranean resources. It focuses on common law and federal and states rules such as rule of capture and the doctrine of correlative rights. It also looks at mineral transactions, conveyances and rules governing resource extraction.
ffc83c52-8667-4944-8d20-67dbb2fc54b3.name: Oil, Gas and Mineral Rights

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Oil, Gas and Mineral Rights course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

40706380-119d-4b01-975c-deb8e382828f.description: This course discusses the purchase and financing of real estate, due diligence in real estate transactions, property ownership and rights, and the unique challenges associated with common property ownership. The mortgages section of the course covers the concepts, documents, and regulations that are important to transactions wherein land is used to secure a purchase loan. It discusses disclosures, document execution, closing procedure, consumer protection laws, default and foreclosure.
40706380-119d-4b01-975c-deb8e382828f.name: Law of Real Estate Transactions and Mortgages

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Law of Real Estate Transactions and Mortgages course
Pass an exam based on the presented materials

6bda4464-fc6d-4551-928d-e27cd8b8e4ee.description: This course introduces the learner to copyrights and copyright protection and focus on enforcement of copyrights and defenses to that enforcement. It covers determining what works can be copyrighted and the extent of the rights held by the copyright holder. It also covers copyright enforcement and defenses to enforcement, such as the fair use doctrine.
6bda4464-fc6d-4551-928d-e27cd8b8e4ee.name: Copyright Law

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the final examination.

866cb9dc-70af-42ca-b9c7-990bcd244b26.description: This course covers many areas of contract law, including negotiating and drafting contracts. Topics covered include offer, acceptance and consideration, contract defenses, performance and remedies. It also looks at common contract provisions, their backgrounds and purposes and the circumstances under which each party is likely to support such provision.
866cb9dc-70af-42ca-b9c7-990bcd244b26.name: Basics of Contract Law

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the final examination.
